caption:
b'The Pepsi is cold and frosty, but this recipe is oh so warm and cozy. Recipe below.

INGREDIENTS
64 oz beef chuck pot roast
12 oz can of Pepsi
1 package dry onion soup mix
Pepper to taste

INSTRUCTIONS
Spray interior of crock pot with cooking spray and add beef chuck. Sprinkle onion soup mix on top of the meat, and then pour Pepsi along the sides careful to not wash off the soup mix. Cover and cook for 8 hours on low or until internal temperature reaches 165 F. Pair with mashed potatoes, vegetables, and Pepsi (of course). Bon appetit!'
b'All this blue, just for you. Drop your fave blue emoji below :down_arrow_selector:.'

b"Embracing the chill of the holiday season the only way we know how (and don\xe2\x80\x99t forget your #reusablestraw). Recipe below.

INGREDIENTS
\xc2\xbc tbs cinnamon
1 tsp nutmeg
1 tsp allspice
12 oz can of Pepsi Zero Sugar
Vanilla ice cream
Whipped cream (optional)

INSTRUCTIONS
In a microwave safe bowl, mix cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice, and \xc2\xbc cup of Pepsi and microwave for 15-30 seconds. In case of clumping, pour spice mixture through a fine colander (or cheese cloth) into a glass then add remaining Pepsi. Stir until mixed thoroughly. Add 2-3 scoops of ice cream, top with whipped cream and a sprinkle of cinnamon for the ultimate holiday treat (And don't\xe2\x80\x99 forget your reusable straw)!"

b'Treat yourself to a mid afternoon pick-me-up with a PZS Cold Brew Frappe. Recipe below :backhand_index_pointing_down:

RECIPE:
6 oz Pepsi Zero Sugar
12 oz cold brew
\xc2\xbc tsp vanilla extract
Ice
Milk of choice (varies by preference)
Desired sweetener (optional)
Whipped cream (optional)
Cinnamon (optional)

INSTRUCTIONS: 
Combine Pepsi, cold brew, vanilla, and ice into a blender. Blend until smooth. Add desired milk of choice or sweeteners. Be your own barista and top it off with whipped cream, cinnamon, or chocolate drizzle and enjoy!'

b'It\xe2\x80\x99s all in the sauce....Pepsi BBQ sauce specifically. Check out the recipe below.

INGREDIENTS
\xc2\xbc tsp garlic powder
1 \xc2\xbd tbs onion powder
2 tablespoons butter
2 \xc2\xbd cups ketchup
8 oz Pepsi
1 \xc2\xbd  tablespoon Worcestershire sauce
1 teaspoon mustard
2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar

INSTRUCTIONS
Add garlic powder, onion powder, butter into large saucepan and bring to medium heat. When butter is melted, add remaining ingredients and simmer. Stir occasionally until thick. Serve with desired meat and enjoy with Pepsi (of course).'

b'Hands off.'

b'Be the Pepsi chef you want to see in the world. Recipe below :backhand_index_pointing_down:

INGREDIENTS:
Pork shoulder
8 oz Pepsi 
12 oz bottle BBQ sauce
1 \xc2\xbd garlic powder
\xc2\xbd tsp onion powder
Salt & pepper to taste
2 tbs hot sauce (optional) 

INSTRUCTIONS: 
Spray crock pot with cooking spray and place pork inside. Pour Pepsi, 8 oz BBQ sauce, garlic powder, onion powder, and hot sauce (if you like a kick). Cover and set on high for 6 hours or until thoroughly cooked. Remove pork, shred, and place back in sauce for another hour on low. Serve on buns and with Pepsi (of course).'

b'Marinate on the deep wonders of the universe while your steak marinates in Pepsi. Recipe below :backhand_index_pointing_down:

INGREDIENTS:
Sirloin steak cuts
12 oz Pepsi
\xc2\xbe cup soy sauce
\xe2\x85\x93 cup Worcestershire  sauce
\xc2\xbe cup brown sugar
1 \xc2\xbd tsp garlic powder
\xc2\xbd tsp garlic salt
1 \xc2\xbd Onion powder
Salt & pepper to taste
Large airtight container.

INSTRUCTIONS:
In airtight container, thoroughly mix Pepsi, soy sauce, Worcester sauce, brown sugar, garlic powder, garlic salt, and onion powder.  Add salt & pepper to taste if desired. Place steak cuts in marinade and let sit overnight in refrigerator. Cook on grill or pan and serve with Pepsi (of course).'
